discussion.content:
Selected Answer: C
C, Continuous Availability (CA) feature. Continuous Availability separates the vRealize Operations cluster into two fault domains, ensuring that data is always 100% synced between the primary node and the replica node. This setup allows the cluster to tolerate failures of an entire physical location or resources dedicated to a single fault domain, ensuring data integrity and availability.
